website_summaries.verdict: Great floral pattern mixed with different possible colors will give you a lot of options to fit the specific design style of your home with this holder.
pros: Deep holder will securely contain multiple umbrellas at the same time
Good for other long objects like canes and walking sticks
cons: Some umbrellas can get tangled up in the confined space

customer_reviews.title: Works good for one large umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Works well - it could be a little sturdier as it falls over if I use two large umbrellas. I wish the clips were black to match the holder. But overall I’m pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Our secretary at the office told me to go to Dollar General and buy a black trash can to keep by the front door for everyone's umbrella's. These are the times when I thank God for Amazon! Yeah, this may have been more expensive than a black trash can, but it looks 100 times better! I am so impressed with the design and quality of this item! I would definitely recommend it and purchase again! Amazon for the win once again!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklynn Hatton

customer_reviews.title: and it looks nice! It came with a clear plastic 'bowl' to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to store my child's long toys in - baseball bats, butterfly nets, etc. With the holes in it my kiddo can see what toys are stored in there, and it looks nice! It came with a clear plastic 'bowl' to go in the bottom of the stand to collect any water that drips, and it also came with two hooks that hang from the top of the stand to hold small items. My only complaint is that I ordered the black stand and the hooks came in white, but that didn't warrant a star off on my review. It's a good, solid umbrella stand that will serve its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Versatile container
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice! I actually bought it to hold rolls of wrapping paper. I already have an umbrella stand that matches my decor, but this was perfect for its intended use. The design allows me to see through, but if I ever needed it as an umbrella stand, it would be beautiful. Very sturdy. Packaged well and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bradway

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some skeptical reviews, I'm happy to say, I love this umbrella holder! Very sturdy, even for my very long umbrellas! I will be buying again for home, as this was for a summer condo!
customer_reviews.author: JamieM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Bent!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on the excellent reviews,mans it is pretty and seems well made, but it is a thinner metal and it arrived bent! Instead of a circle, it's been mashed into an oval. My husband insists he can "bend it back", but for 4T dollars for an umbrella stand, I don't think he should have to!!! It's a nice stand, but the packaging was poor.
customer_reviews.author: Desperate Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. 3 Stars at most.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in original box which is thick walled but still the top part is slightly out of shape / out of round. So had to try to bend it back into round and got pretty close. It really is more like a $20 product than a $35+ product. Taller umbrellas like a golf umbrella will tend to lean out a bit too much for my liking. The bottom plastic tray is super cheap and should have included dividers so the umbrella tip would slide and cause taller umbrellas to tip. Just a 3 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan's Review

customer_reviews.title: More solid than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this attractive, it's solid enough not to be tilty. I liked it so much that I bought one for my dad for his many canes.
customer_reviews.author: s losee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and doesn't tip over
customer_reviews.text: Great for my canes. The plastic drip tray holds the snow that drips off my cane tip for ice. I keep 3 or 4 in there all the time and it doesn't tip over. Sturdy and attractive. Mine arrived in good shape, no dents and not misshapen. .
customer_reviews.author: TWINDORTH

customer_reviews.title: It is also a good place to store
customer_reviews.text: This is a decorative way to store an umbrella, by the front or back door. It isn't an eyesore, and looks contemporary. It has a plastic disc, in the bottom, to catch any water run off. I have large umbrellas in mine, I just angle them across. It is also a good place to store, dog leashes ( in the bottom), by the front door. I have also thrown some emergency rain ponchos, (that I also purchased from Amazon), in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: It's Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I found the stand to be made of thin metal and was already misshaped when it arrived to my home. As it's also very light it did not work well for holding multiple umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Used as a cane holder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella stand for the purpose of holding canes that my husband collects. It's attractive, well made and is the perfect solution to hold all his canes.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Ok, does the job for now but it looks squished/dented
customer_reviews.text: This looks great from a distance. Up close it is easy to see that the shape is off some, it isn’t a true circle it seems to be bent a bit. It still does the job but I wish the quality/construction was more well done. I would buy a different brand next time due to the lack of quality/durability.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3 (BOYS!)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. Comes with a plastic liner that you can pull out and clean if it gets mildew from a wet umbrella. Also has a hook that you can place on the inside or outside of umbrella stand for smaller purse-size umbrellas. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Caren B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; durable and not likely to tip over
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this looks. Using it to store walking canes and other long items. I was concerned that it would tip over once I put several into the stand, but I was pleasantly surprised at how durable it is and how good it looks. NOTE; If you are using it for wet umbrellas it does not have a liner at the bottom like some other umbrella stands.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: An Umbrella stand that’s meets all needs
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella stand is just what I was looking for! It is lightweight yet a sturdy construction. There is a clear drain pan down in bottom which can be removed for easy cleaning. Height is perfect for taller sports umbrellas and standard size umbrellas. It also comes with hooks you can use for compact umbrellas that have the loop for hanging on the side. Very nice design and well made!
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA B.

customer_reviews.title: An umbrella stand that is functional,  slim lined, and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: We were in need of an umbrella stand for the front door. I was also looking for something to hold my canes, my reacher, walking stick & long handled shoe horn. I was pleasantly surprised to find out that all the items fit in that slim umbrella stand! And it fits in a small space attractively; not like clutter.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a relative to keep canes and umbrellas in, and she loves it. Felt feet keep the floor from scratching
customer_reviews.author: H,T,

customer_reviews.title: It was just what I thought it would look like. It holds all my canes and umbrellas with ...
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I thought it would look like. It holds all my canes and umbrellas with no problems. I would say, the metal can bend if your not careful. Love the look, just the right piece for my needs.

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Umbrella Stand, Long and Short Umbrella Rack, Free Standing Holder for Canes Walking Sticks, with Drip Tray 2 Hooks, White ULUC20W
feature_bullets: RELIABLE QUALITY: Durable metal construction and fine workmanship offers you a better usage experience for storing or drying umbrellas.
CONSIDERATE ACCESSORIES: Removable plastic drain tray to protect any kind of floor from water. 2 extra small hooks for hanging fold-up umbrellas.
INNOVATIVE DESIGN: This umbrella stand with special design hollowed-out body allows your umbrellas freely breathe.

VERSATILE APPLICATION: Used as a decor for organizing your umbrellas, canes, walk sticks, wrapping paper, swords, baby toys, etc. in entryway or door of any home, office, apartment, hotel, bars and so on.
PRODUCT SIZE: 7.7"L x 7.7"W x 19.3"H (19.5 x 19.5 x 49cm).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars524 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: SONGMICS Umbrella Stand Long/Short Umbrella Rack Free Standing Holder for Canes/Walking Sticks, with Drip Tray/2 Hooks White ULUC20W
